SELECT send_date AS statDate, COUNT(id) AS number, SUM(fee) AS fee, SUM(fee_real) AS feeReal FROM "sell" WHERE send_date BETWEEN #from# AND #to# GROUP BY send_date ORDER BY send_date DESC
